00153         inline GLchar* _readShader(const char* path)
00154         {  
00155                 long size;
00156                 GLchar* buf;
00157                 FILE* fp = fopen(path,"rb");
00158                 if (!fp)
00159                 {
00160                         printf("Error: Could not open shader %s\n", path);
00161                         return NULL;
00162                 }
00163                 fseek(fp,0,SEEK_END);
00164                 size = ftell(fp);
00165                 buf = new GLchar[size + 1];
00166                 memset(buf, 0, size + 1);
00167                 fseek(fp,0,SEEK_SET);
00168                 fread(buf, 1, size, fp);
00169                 fclose(fp);
00170                 return buf;
00171         }
